C

com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j - package com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j
 
com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.action - package com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.action
 
com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication - package com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication

com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.util - package com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.util
 
ConsoleInteraction - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction
Concrete class that provides interact method implementation of abstract Interaction class in order to let user interact with bot via standard console streams (System.in and System.out).
ConsoleInteraction(HttpCommunicationType) - Constructor for class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.ConsoleInteraction
Creates concrete implementation of Interaction class via standard console (System.in and System.out are encapsulated by BufferedReader and PrintWriter respectively) by using specified HttpCommunicationType.
Context - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j
Singleton class that contains reference to context (ObjectNode) object that represents the current session state of an application.
Converse - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication
Class for communication with Wit.ai bot through converse request type of Wit.ai HTTP API.
Converse() - Constructor for class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.Converse
Creates instance of Converse class and instantiate variables described above.
ConverseResponseType - Enum in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication
Enumeration for defining response type of Wit.ai HTTP API while executing handleHttpResponse method of Converse class.
createHttpCommunication(HttpCommunicationType) - Static method in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.HttpCommunicationFactory
 
CustomInteraction - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction

H

handleHttpResponse(JsonNode) - Method in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.Converse
Handles JSON response according to type of bot response (merge - first bot action after a user message, msg - the bot has something to say, action - the bot has something to do or stop - the bot is waiting to proceed).
handleHttpResponse(JsonNode) - Method in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.HttpCommunication
Handles JSON response that is returned by appropriate sendHttpRequest method call.
HttpCommunication - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication
This class is responsible for defining an abstract structure of making http requests and handling http responses (json files) using Wit.ai HTTP API in order to communicate with bot.
HttpCommunication() - Constructor for class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.HttpCommunication
 
httpCommunication - Variable in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.Interaction
HttpCommunication object for sending requests and retrieving responses from bot through Wit.ai HTTP API.
HttpCommunicationFactory - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication
Factory class for creating instances of concrete HttpCommunication subclasses using HttpCommunicationType enumeration.
HttpCommunicationFactory() - Constructor for class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.HttpCommunicationFactory
 
HttpCommunicationType - Enum in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication
Enum for defining type and instantiating concrete implementation (by HttpCommunicationFactory) of HttpCommunication subclasses.
httpConnection - Variable in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.HttpCommunication
Http connection that is responsible for setting request headers and body as well as reading response.

I

IAction - Interface in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.action
Functional interface that must be implemented by every action in Map<String, IAction> (actions map for application).
input - Variable in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.Interaction
Stream for reading user input.
interact() - Method in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.ConsoleInteraction
Reads input and writes appropriate output to user.
interact() - Method in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.CustomInteraction
 
interact() - Method in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.Interaction
Describes the way of user interaction with bot.
interact(InputStream, OutputStream, HttpCommunicationType) - Method in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.Wit
Starts interaction with user based on streams provided by creating an instance of Interaction subclasses using InteractionFactory class.
interactByConsole(HttpCommunicationType) - Method in class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.Wit
Starts interaction with a user through standard console and its streams (System.in, System.out) by creating an instance of Interaction subclasses using InteractionFactory class.
Interaction - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction
This class provides a skeleton for user interaction with a bot by using two streams (input and output) for taking and giving data to user and an object of HttpCommunication class for communicating with bot.
Interaction(InputStream, OutputStream, HttpCommunicationType) - Constructor for class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.Interaction
Creates interaction object that make possible for user to communicate with bot.
InteractionFactory - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction
Factory class for instantiating Interaction subclasses' objects.
InteractionFactory() - Constructor for class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.InteractionFactory

Wit - Class in com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j
